content.question: Which of the following is a common criticism of first-past-the-post voting systems?

choices.label: Electoral mandates are difficult to achieve.
They are strongly correlated with negative economic growth.
Officials cannot be held electorally accountable.
Social and ethnic tensions tend to become inflamed.
